text: "Live While We're Young" is a 2012 song by English-Irish boy band One Direction and is the lead single from their second studio album Take Me Home. It topped the single charts in Ireland and New Zealand and went to the top 10 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Italy, Japan, Mexico, the Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and the United States. == Track listing == * Digital download – EP # "Live While We're Young" – 3:18 # "Live While We're Young" – 5:40 # "Live While We're Young" – 4:25 # "I Want" (Live) – 3:06 # "Moments" (Live) – 4:44 * UK and US CD single # "Live While We're Young" – 3:18 # "I Want" (Live) – 3:06 == References == Category:2012 songs Category:One Direction songs Category:Bubblegum pop songs
title: Live While We're Young
